value.title: Power BI Tutorial | Working with JSON data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Adam shows how you can easily work with JSON data within Power BI. Working with JSON data in Power BI Desktop is one of the best-kept secrets of Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Start your Power BI journey with Guy in a Cube
value.excerpt: Want to learn Power BI from the masters?   Coming from Microsoft Excel and not sure where to start? Or, maybe you've used Power BI but want to make sure you are doing the right thing. value.title: How to Create Power BI TOP N Report (Variable TOP N Filter)

value.title: DAX Fridays! #14: SUMMARIZE
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the function SUMMARIZE in DAX/ Powerpivot.  The function SUMMARIZE can return a summary of sales grouped around the calendar year and the product category name, this result table allows you to do analysis over the reseller sales by year and product category.  Source:https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg492171.aspx

value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
